snippet: The S.&P. 500, Dow and Nasdaq indexes rose sharply a day before the Federal Reserve convenes a two-day meeting.
abstract: Stock market rises strongly ahead of Federal Reserve meeting on interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The S.&P. 500, Dow and Nasdaq indexes rose sharply a day before the Federal Reserve convenes a two-day meeting.

headline.main: Market Climbs as Wall Street Awaits Fed Decision
headline.print_headline: Market Climbs as Wall Street Awaits Fed Decision
